Name: Strawberry Fruit Sorbet
Description: A refreshing fruit sorbet made from strawberries and freshly squeezed lemons.

DescriptionLocalization.ko: 딸기로 만든 상큼한 과일 소르베트와 갓 짠 레몬.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Un sorbet rafraîchissant fait à partir de fraises et d'un citron fraîchement pressé.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Egy frissítő gyümölcs sörbet eperből, és frissen facsart citromból.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 由草莓和鲜榨柠檬制成的新鲜水果雪葩。
